title: The X-Ray Tech That Reveals Chip Designs - IEEE Spectrum
content: The X-Ray Tech That Reveals Chip Designs  IEEE Spectrum
description: When you’re baking a cake, it’s hard to know when the inside is in the state you want it to be. The same is true—with much higher stakes—for microelectronic chips: How can engineers confirm that what’s inside has truly met the intent of the designers? How can a semiconductor design company tell wh
